strapiPost.title: Loloft Reimagines The Warehouse Industry in Northwest Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
Loloft will celebrate a huge milestone in its journey to redefine the warehouse industry with a ribbon-cutting ceremony and celebration at its flagship location in Downtown Rogers tomorrow, Aug 24, at 5p.

Micro-warehousing: In its 30,000ft2 warehouse converted from an old ice factory in Downtown Rogers, Loloft will offer small businesses their own private micro-warehouse units and purpose-built solutions such as shipping receipt and unloading services, loading dock access, and daily carrier services.

Coworking spaces: Additionally, companies can benefit from Loloftâ€™s elegant coworking amenities with access to high-speed WiFi, meeting rooms, phone booths, and community engagement.

RSVP for the Ribbon Cutting Ceremony HERE.
